diningOptions.name: Blue Salt and Coffee
diningOptions.description: A refined all-day dining experience offering an exquisite array of multi-cuisine options, available 24 hours a day.  Features garden and pool views, a buffet, and an impressive selection of alcoholic beverages.

diningOptions.name: Splash Bar & Grill
diningOptions.description: Relaxed outdoor dining with poolside elegance, a multi-cuisine menu and buffet, and a selection of fine drinks. Perfect for a leisurely experience under the stars.

diningOptions.name: Citron - The Lounge Bar
diningOptions.description: Intimate and elegant indoor setting offering a diverse selection of multi-cuisine delights and drinks. Features a refined ambience and happy hours.
